title: Executive Order 5871-Regulations Governing Sick Leave of Absence Authorized by Law
content: The regulations of the several executive departments and independent establishments pertaining to the so-called sick leave of absence now authorized by law shall continue in effect until such time as uniform regulations may be prescribed under the authority contained in Part II, section 215, of the act entitled "AN ACT Making appropriations for the Legislative Branch of the Government for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1933, and for other purposes," approved June 30, 1932.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5871-Regulations Governing Sick Leave of Absence Authorized by Law Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361463
